name: The Doonesbury Special
summary: Garry Trudeau's classic characters (Mike Doonesbury, Zonker, etc.) examine how their lifestyles, priorities, and concerns have changed since the end of their idealistic college days in the 1960's.
info:
• 中文名: 杜斯别里家族
  • 上映年度: 1977-11-27
  • 片长: 25min
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 导演: Faith Hubley / John Hubley
  • 编剧: Garry Trudeau
